elements.title: lang::report_3_users_online::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT lastip
  FROM mdl_local_kopere_bi_online
 WHERE currenttime > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - (5 * 60)

elements.title: lang::report_3_users_online_list::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT DISTINCT 
    u.id AS u_id, 
    u.firstname,
    u.lastname,
    kbo.city_name,
    kbo.country_name
FROM 
    mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
JOIN 
    mdl_user u ON u.id = kbo.userid
WHERE 
    kbo.currenttime > UNIX_TIMESTAMP() - (5 * 60)

elements.title: lang::report_3_course_access_time::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT 
    c.fullname,
    count(DISTINCT kbo.userid) AS 'lang::num_user::local_kopere_bi',
    SUM(kbo.seconds)           AS 'lang::secounds::local_kopere_bi'
FROM 
    mdl_course c
LEFT JOIN 
    mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo ON kbo.courseid = c.id
GROUP BY 
    c.id

elements.title: lang::report_3_top_browsers::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT 
    kbo.client_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT kbo.userid) AS num_users
FROM 
    mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
JOIN 
    mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY 
    kbo.client_name, 
    kbo.client_version
LIMIT 15

elements.title: lang::report_3_operating_systems::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT 
    kbo.os_name, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT kbo.userid) AS num_users
FROM 
    mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
JOIN 
    mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY 
    kbo.os_name
LIMIT 15

elements.title: lang::report_3_top_country_access::local_kopere_bi
elements.commandsql:
SELECT
    kbo.country_name, 
    COUNT(DISTINCT kbo.userid)
FROM 
    mdl_local_kopere_bi_online kbo
JOIN 
    mdl_user c ON c.id = kbo.userid
GROUP BY 
    kbo.city_name, 
    kbo.country_name
LIMIT 15
